name: Tua Pek Kong Temple
description: Iconic Chinese temple with 7-story pagoda by Rajang River.

name: Sibu Heritage Centre
description: Museum preserving Sibu's cultural and historical identity.

name: Lau King Howe Hospital Museum
description: Malaysia’s only medical museum with antique hospital tools.

name: Sibu Central Market
description: The largest covered market in Malaysia. Authentic street life.

name: Sibu Night Market
description: Lively evening market for local snacks and clothing.

name: Bukit Lima Forest Park
description: Peat swamp forest trail with wildlife sightings and boardwalk.

name: Taman Bukit Aup
description: Hilltop park with panoramic city views and jogging trails.

name: Rajang Esplanade
description: Riverwalk with views of Rajang River and Sibu skyline.

name: Sibu Gateway
description: Park with swan statues and zodiac displays. Great for photos.

name: Swan Statue
description: Iconic white swan sculpture symbolizing Sibu’s nickname.

name: Sibu River Cruise
description: Scenic sunset river cruise along the mighty Rajang River.
